languages.text: "Арджента, не тяжело ли вам без ваших сестер? Я бы предположил, что это — как быть солдатом без отряда".
"Argenta, don't you find it difficult to be without your sisters? You are a soldier without a squad."
languages.original_text: "Арджента, не тяжело ли вам без ваших сестер? Я бы предположил, что это — как быть солдатом без отряда".

traits.locale_text: "Argenta, don't you find it difficult to be without your sisters? I imagine it is like being a soldier without a squad."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Argenta, don't you find it difficult to be without your sisters? I imagine it is like being a soldier without a squad."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Argenta, don't you find it difficult to be without your sisters? I imagine it is like being a soldier without a squad."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Argenta, don't you find it difficult to be without your sisters? I imagine it is like being a soldier without a squad."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “阿洁塔，离开了其他修女姐妹，你会感到孤独吗？你就像离开了连队的士兵一样。”
languages.original_text: "Argenta, don't you find it difficult to be without your sisters? You are a soldier without a squad."

traits.locale_text: “阿洁塔，离开了其他修女姐妹，你会感到孤独吗？我猜，这种感觉就像是离开了连队的士兵一样。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Argenta, ne regrettez-vous pas de ne pas avoir vos sœurs à vos côtés ? Vous êtes pareille à un soldat séparé de son escouade. »
languages.original_text: "Argenta, don't you find it difficult to be without your sisters? You are a soldier without a squad."

traits.locale_text: « Argenta, ne regrettez-vous pas de ne pas avoir vos sœurs avec vous ? J'imagine que ce serait comme être un soldat séparé de son escouade. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Argenta, findet Ihr es nicht schwierig, ohne Eure Schwestern zu sein? Ihr seid ein Soldat ohne Trupp."
languages.original_text: "Argenta, don't you find it difficult to be without your sisters? You are a soldier without a squad."

traits.locale_text: "Argenta, findet Ihr es nicht schwierig, ohne Eure Schwestern zu sein? Ich vermute, das ist ähnlich wie ein Soldat ohne seine Einheit."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「アルジェンタ、シスターと一緒にいれなくて辛いと思わないのか？部隊を持たない兵士じゃないか」
languages.original_text: "Argenta, don't you find it difficult to be without your sisters? You are a soldier without a squad."

traits.locale_text: 「アルジェンタ、シスターと一緒にいれなくて辛いと思わないのか？部隊を持たない兵士のようなものだろう」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Argenta, ¿no le resulta difícil obrar en ausencia de sus hermanas? Es como ser soldado sin escuadrón».
languages.original_text: "Argenta, don't you find it difficult to be without your sisters? You are a soldier without a squad."

traits.locale_text: «Argenta, ¿no le resulta difícil obrar en ausencia de sus hermanas? Imagino que es como ser soldado sin escuadrón».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "Argenta, don't you find it difficult to be without your sisters? You are a soldier without a squad."

languages.text: "Argenta, rahibe kardeşlerin olmadan zor olmuyor mu? Mangasız bir asker gibi."
languages.original_text: "Argenta, don't you find it difficult to be without your sisters? You are a soldier without a squad."

traits.locale_text: "Argenta, rahibe kardeşlerin olmadan zor olmuyor mu? Mangasız bir asker gibi."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
